meanings.sent1: The inscriber carefully wrote the message on the stone tablet.
meanings.sent2: The inscriber signed their name at the bottom of the document.
meanings.sent3: The inscriber's penmanship was so neat that everyone admired it.
meanings.sent4: She was an inscriber of stories, etching tales into the minds of readers.
meanings.sent5: The inscriber's work was so precise that it seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for inscribing.
meanings.sent1: The inscriber was made of sharp metal for engraving on wood.
meanings.sent2: The inscriber was a small, handheld device used for labeling items.
meanings.sent3: The inscriber was so tiny that it could fit in the palm of your hand.
meanings.sent4: The inscriber gleamed under the light, ready to mark any surface.
meanings.sent5: The inscriber's tip was so precise that it could create intricate designs.

meanings.definition: To write, engrave, or carve words or symbols onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: She used the inscriber to carve her initials into the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist inscribed a beautiful quote on the monument using an inscriber.
meanings.sent3: He inscribed his name on the cake with the inscriber, making it his own.
meanings.sent4: The inscriber etched the words into the metal, leaving a lasting mark.
meanings.sent5: Using the inscriber, she engraved a heart on the pendant as a symbol of love.
